title: Lightning spire

==Useful Info==
'''Lightning spires''' are uncommon defensive structures whose purpose is simple: to shoot [[bolt of electricity|bolts of electricity]] at any enemy who stumbles into their range. They are fairly fragile, but nearly immune to most elemental spells. Outside of [[Summon Lightning Spire]], they are extremely rare, but can be found defending certain [[vault]]s (including one [[rune]] vault in [[the Abyss]]).

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Electrical Bolt, unlike [[Lightning Bolt]], is both quiet and accurate. It can still [[doublezap]], though.
*Hostile lightning spires are as strong as [[electric eel]]s; by the time you find them, most characters can survive smashing through. rElec is still recommended, though, as they usually come in electric-themed [[vault]]s.
*Lightning spires can't [[see invisible]]. A friendly lightning spire can hit you if you're invisible and there's a monster in the path.

==History==
*[[Summon Lightning Spire]] was added in [[0.14]].
*Lightning Spires were introduced for [[Zot Defense]] in [[0.9]].
